category: Management group operation regulations/Article 4 (Effect of designation of management group)
contents: Article 4 (Effect of designation as a management organization) ① All rights and authority of a member organization designated as a management organization are immediately suspended, and the Sports Association takes charge of the overall affairs of the member organization. Revised on October 6, 2021 ② Executives and officials of the member organization (hereinafter referred to as *member organization officials) cannot claim their rights as members of the member organization, cannot participate in any decision-making related to the member organization, and cannot participate in the decisions of the sports conference. You cannot act against decisions or work performance. Revised 2021. 10. 6. ③ If it is determined that the member organization has been normalized, such as the termination of the reason for designation as a management organization, the Sports Council will notify the member organization of the cancellation of the designation as a management organization through a resolution by the board of directors, and the management organization in question will immediately receive the notice. Restore the rights of the Sports Association as a member organization. Revised 2021. 10. 6. ④ At the time of designation as a management organization, among the delegates of the relevant member organization, the delegates pursuant to Article 7 (1) of the Member Sports Organization Regulations shall be suspended from their duties as head of the affiliated organization for 2 years from the date of designation of the management organization. However, depending on the operating situation of the management organization, the period of suspension may be determined differently through resolution by the board of directors. Newly established 2021. 10. 6.
